alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 4:27PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain possible. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. Very cold wind chills in the mid to upper teens expected. * WHERE...Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist, Upper Lafourche and Upper Terrebonne Parishes. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads, may become slippery. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute overnight and Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as rain this afternoon and evening, but as temperatures quickly fall tonight, there will be a very brief opportunity for freezing rain mainly overnight. Precipitation ends from west to east late tonight, but icy roads are may continue into the morning commute with any remaining water on roads quickly freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
